casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joel McCULLOUGH. No. 204P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006.

Leonard G. Green, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Amended Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
